00016 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00017                Plane::Plane(int r,int c)
00018 //
00019 // Creates placement map and sets all sectors as free, all lists
00020 // of critical points empty.
00021 {
00022   rows=r;
00023   cols=c;
00024 
00025   if( (array = (PlaneCell**)calloc(cols,sizeof(PlaneCell*) )) ==NULL)
00026     usrErr("Plane::Plane",ENOTMEM);
00027   
00028   PlaneCell **colPtr=array;
00029   for(int i=0;i<cols;i++,colPtr++)
00030   {
00031     if( (*colPtr = new PlaneCell[rows]) ==NULL)
00032       usrErr("Plane::Plane",ENOTMEM);
00033   }
00034 
00035 }// Plane::Plane  //
00036 
00037 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00038                Plane::~Plane( void  )
00039 //
00040 // Desctructor : frees allocated memory.
00041 {
00042   PlaneCell **colPtr=array;
00043 
00044     for(int i=0;i<cols;i++,colPtr++)
00045     {
00046         PlaneCell *tmp=*colPtr;
00047         delete [] tmp;
00048     }
00049     delete array;
00050 
00051 
00052 }// Plane::~Plane  //
00053 
00054 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 void Plane::getEffSize(int& x,int& y)
00056 //
00057 // Returns the effective size of the placement plane (rectangle used by cells)
00058 {
00059   x=y=0;
00060 
00061   for(int i=0;i<rows;i++)
00062     for(int j=0;j<cols;j++)
00063       if( getPattern(j,i) ) // there is something here
00064       {
00065     if(i>y)
00066       y=i;
00067     if(j>x)
00068       x=j;
00069       }
00070   x++;
00071   y++;
00072 }// Plane::getEffSize  //
